name: Casting Lots
description:
(Play browser version in fullscreen, or download the Windows executable for the best experience)

Astra is on the run from the Necromancer! Equip her with powerful spell dice that change the effects of the spell each time you cast it, and fight back the undead hordes.

On level up, you choose a modifier die to improve your spell with powerful effects. These can:

  • Alter the element of the spell (see list below for elements)
  •  Improve the attack
  •   Increase the size of the spell
  •  Add a chance for critical damage

The elements are:

  •   Fire. Deals a percent of the attack’s damage to enemies over time.
  •  Ice. Slows enemies for a long time.
  •  Lightning. Doubles the damage of critical attacks.
  •  Radiant. Stuns enemies for a short time.
